prompt: Minimal dumbbell icon, side view silhouette, clean geometric shapes, flat design, single solid color on transparent background, no gradients, no shadows, centered composition
style_notes: Must work as single-color tintable asset. Keep design simple - max 3 shapes. No 3D effects.

prompt: Stylized multiplication or repetition symbol, abstract repeating pattern icon, minimal geometric, flat design, single solid color on transparent background, no gradients
style_notes: Represents 'reps' concept. Consider interlocking shapes or x-pattern. Must be tintable.

prompt: Crown icon or single star, clean geometric design, sharp edges, minimal style, single solid color on transparent background, represents achievement/mastery
style_notes: Elite achievement badge. Crown or 5-point star. Simple and bold. Tintable.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, industrial metal aesthetic, rivets or bolts at corners, rough texture edges, iron gray color (#71797E), transparent center, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Iron tier - rugged, industrial, entry-level feel. Fixed color.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, hammered metal texture, warm bronze patina, organic curves, bronze color (#CD7F32), transparent center, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Bronze tier - crafted but humble. Hint of warmth. Fixed color.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, polished silver finish, clean geometric lines, elegant simplicity, silver color (#C0C0C0), transparent center, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Silver tier - refined, clean, aspirational. Fixed color.

style_notes: Gold tier - prestigious, luxurious but not gaudy. Fixed color.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, sleek platinum design, futuristic elements, premium minimal, platinum color (#E5E4E2), transparent center, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Platinum tier - exclusive, modern, technical excellence. Fixed color.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, crystalline faceted design, light blue diamond aesthetic, geometric precision, diamond color (#B9F2FF), transparent center, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Diamond tier - rare, crystalline, geometric perfection. Fixed color.

prompt: Decorative badge frame, ethereal/cosmic design, flowing energy lines, legendary aesthetic, single neutral gray on transparent background, circular or shield shape
style_notes: Mythic tier - MUST be grayscale for theme tinting. Cosmic/legendary feel.

prompt: Simple decorative frame, clean lines, minimal ornaments, suitable for achievement display, single neutral gray on transparent background, rectangular with rounded corners
style_notes: Basic achievement frame. Tintable. Keep it clean and professional.

prompt: Ornate decorative frame with flourishes, gold color (#FFD700), elegant scrollwork corners, prestigious styling, transparent center, rectangular
style_notes: Premium achievement frame. Fixed gold color. More elaborate than standard.

prompt: Four-pointed star, sharp geometric, single solid color, transparent background, perfectly centered, minimal design
style_notes: For particle systems. Must be very simple. Tintable.

prompt: Fire ember shape, organic teardrop, warm orange color (#FF6B35), slight glow effect implied in shape, transparent background
style_notes: For Iron Forge theme particles. Fixed warm color.

prompt: Electric spark, angular lightning bolt fragment, ice blue color (#06B6D4), sharp edges, transparent background
style_notes: For Midnight Ice theme particles. Fixed cool color.

prompt: Flame or fire streak icon, dynamic upward motion, single solid color on transparent background, flat design, bold shape
style_notes: Represents workout streaks. Tintable. Energetic feel.

prompt: Uniform noise pattern, very subtle grain texture, mid-gray value, tileable/seamless edges, film grain aesthetic
style_notes: Used as overlay at 5% opacity. Must tile seamlessly. Grayscale only.
